scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.js --bundle --minify --platform=browser --outfile=dist/bundle.js && copyfiles index.html dist
scripts.dev: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.js --bundle --sourcemap --platform=browser --outfile=dist/bundle.js && copyfiles index.html dist && live-server dist --port=8080
